website_summaries.verdict: A high-end immersion blender with a 400W motor perfect for all your kitchen tasks.
pros: Comes with a variety of convenient attachments including a whisk and chopper container
Smart-Speed technology allows for speed to be controlled via pressure on the device's power button
Blender has a grippy ergonomic handle and a safety lock
cons: Containers included are made of plastic that some users found flimsy

customer_reviews.title: loved it at first . . . but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this hand held blender for just under a year. Originally, I loved it! I use a hand held blender quite often to blend drinks, soups, etc... About 2 months ago, however, I began having trouble with the unlock feature. Somehow the bottom attachment was not clicking into the top piece properly and I had to detatch and re-attach a few times to get the green light to go on - which is the only way you can use the blender. At this point it takes me about 5 minutes of detaching and re-attaching to get it to work and sometimes it does not work at all. I do not recommend this product only for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: LSG

customer_reviews.title: Point of Failure
customer_reviews.text: This item was a gift for my wife who was using a wimpy stick blender with limited abilities.... and who didn't open the box for like 6 months before beginning to use it. She loved it! She used every attachment! Moderate to light tasks.. but she did use it frequently. With all this heavy duty motor and the Braun brand to stand behind it... I expected better. The point of failure was the little plastic piece that holds the attachments so that the active piece in it spins, powered by the motor. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Special

customer_reviews.title: soso
customer_reviews.text: The blades started rusting the first time I washed them. This is not stainless steel at all, which is quite frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: The Braun is lighter and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Braun to replace a different brand that had broken. The Braun is lighter and easy to use. Clean up is simple. I have used the whip and the mini chopper. Both have done an excellent job. So far I am very happy with the Braun's performance.
customer_reviews.author: D & T

customer_reviews.title: Totally not satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Ths compact, space saving and convenience was the only reason I purchased this product. But within few months of using the chopper and slicer attachment, came to know that continuous usage damaged the fitting and also heated up quiet a bit within few sec. Now the chopper gets stuck with just 2 one inch piece of onion or any other vegetable.
customer_reviews.author: Rigesh R

customer_reviews.title: Flashfire sez: sleek and powerful driver, junky attachments.
customer_reviews.text: The driver is powerful and of obvious quality. The attachments not so much. The wisp is flimsy. The attachments chop, slice, etc but really make a mess out of whatever your chopping, slicing; green peppers and jalapeños were reduced to mulch. Curly fries were good but again, a lot of waste (mush). The potato masher is a joke, ended up with wallpaper paste with lumps. Lost the packing so I'm stuck with it. Wish I had bought the one without all of the attachments as the driver is really powerful.
customer_reviews.author: FlashFire

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. Tried chopping some pecans n it broke after 2 minutes, then tried blending n it started smelling burned. Bought it for elderly parents to try to make their life easier. They are sticking with their old fashioned appliances. So embarrassed 😬😬
customer_reviews.author: Alex alarcon

customer_reviews.title: I gifted this to my sister. She opened after ...
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my sister. She opened after a month and used it to chop onions. After first few pushes the motor burned with steam coming out and the machine was dead. Since it was after a month's time seller refused to exchange it and asked me to contact the company. No reply from them. I think I will have to bear the loss.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: One of the biggest piece of crap i've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: used it 3 times and the motor shot craps. One of the biggest piece of crap i've ever purchased. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cowden

customer_reviews.title: Love it for so many reasons
customer_reviews.text: Love it for so many reasons. Very happy I decided to buy a higher end stick blender. Well worth the money. PROS Safety "on button" feature prevents blade from accidentally rotating before unit is placed in container Easy to change attachments Easy to clean Variable speed managed with finger pressure Easy to hold (nice ergonomic design) Good cord placement (does not get in your way while using) POWERFUL!!! I finally can make the best home-made mayo, every time Angle of the blade/design facilitates continuous circulation and flow across the blade (I dont have to move the head around to get a complete blend) CONS I wish the mixing cup was taller and made of glass rather than plastic
customer_reviews.author: NonnieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Make Sure to Get It at the New Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with what we are dissatisfied with: within a week or so of purchasing this, it dropped in price by $25 or so. So that is the biggest bummer of them all - feels like we paid too much for something we otherwise enjoy. That said, we do enjoy this! We haven't used all the attachments so far, but what we have used or experimented with has been great. The attachments aren't the easiest to clean, and I do worry if the attaching end soaks in water that they may become unusable, but the build quality is good enough that they have held up so far and come clean after a quick soak of the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender with cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: Hand held blender works great. Great spped control with your finger. The attachment pieces, the parts I use often are made with cheap plastic. It didnt take long for the plastic parts to crack and break making the chopper portion of the blender useless. I am sending it back. Makes sense that the price came down form $100 to $67. It has a design flaw that Braun is first realizing
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This hand blender is great! It is so quick and has so much power. Our old hand blender was dying and we use it so often we decided to be proactive and buy another one before the old one (a Cuisinart) died completely. I am so glad we did. In fact, I kind of wish we had purchased this one a long time ago. It is so much better than what we had. Minced garlic? Sure, in 2 seconds. Blend soup? Sure, no problem. Seriously, this was a great purchase - we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but the Instruction Manual need work.
customer_reviews.text: So far I used it once to shred rotisserie chicken (no bones) and it worked great!!! I was impressed and cannot wait to try the other attachments for potatoes and soups etc. however, the instruction manual is kinda useless. Not very helpful or explanatory of the different blades uses etc. someone else mentioned the same thing in their review and they were right. But I figured it out myself (trial and error always works). If the manual was more clear, they would have received 5 stars. But the quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great product/Perfect for arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase. I was only looking for the immersion blender when I found this. The blender is amazing! Works great and is perfect for our needs! I bought it for my girlfriend who has arthritis in her hands and she said the blender is very easy to hold and use and not painful at all! The rest of the items that came in the set were wonderful added bonuses!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the bowl to chop 4 jalepenos, the tiny "cheap plastic" part broke. sp this makes the bowl chopper useless. It broke yesterday. Too late to return it. Should have kept the previous Milagro stick blender. it was at least quality.
customer_reviews.author: SandraLewisDavisQuerin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works great. The chopping bowl is pretty small and doesn’t work too great with nuts and dried fruit, with even chopping. Easy to clean and use. Like that it has a variable speed trigger control.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Burning Smell!
customer_reviews.text: Update: My blender broke after 3 months of light use. Buyers may want to know: if you use this blender with high speed for more than 5 mins, you can see smoke coming out and smell the plastic burning smell. My suggestion is looking for another blender or tries not to use the high speed that much.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Hand-blender Perfection
customer_reviews.text: The best hand blender. Well designed so there is no splashing when blending sauces or soups in a pan. The chopper is small, but just what I need to chop/process small quantities of nuts or condiments and not drag out my large food processor. I like the hand-controlled variable speed lever because I don't have to take my hand off the handle to change the speed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Above Average Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at the devices ability to puree meat. Zapped right through it, with very little hesitation. Haven't had an opportunity to use it on raw vegetables, yet. The down side is the side release buttons are a little resistant. Have to work with it a bit before it will release. That's annoying. Also, the cord is in an awkward location and in the way. Although the metal inserts are a little on the light weight, they are very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller uses
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this product because i mainly wanted to make smoothies (not with ice) and use the food processor for baby food or the occasional sauce/dip. The blender is great for my smoothies, not sure how it would fair with ice inside as I haven't tried it. The whisk attachment has limited use. You can use it for whipping up heavy cream in a SMALL container (the smoothie cup it came with is perfect), but getting stiff peaks from egg whites?-IMPOSSIBLE. It's just not strong enough for that. So far I'm pleased with the food processor, does the job for small batches and is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Fischer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. It can handle basic processing, and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It can handle basic processing, and blending liquid formulas that aren't too chunky, but any kind of heavy duty smoothie making that involves fruits and veggies, this struggles. For people looking to make a smoothie with this, and are smoothie fanatics, just get a blender.
customer_reviews.author: GENE S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the Hand, Excellent Design
customer_reviews.text: This one is much easier to operate than other hand blenders I've had. The safety lock stays unlocked for a second or two, so that the button to run the blender can be pushed before the lock engages again. This means only one button has to be held down to operate it. The main blender button is large and easy to depress, so that it doesn't tire your hand to use it. The blender seems solid, and so far I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Catbrat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good. Hand blender works good. Chopping cup size is too small, it barely chops quarter of an onion, if the onion is small enough. To chop a full onion one has to load and unload the cup 5-6 times. Definitely not what I was expecting. Most of the time chopping by hand feels less work and less tears compare to using this product. Blades are leveled only at the buttom of the cup, so it always leaves un chopped pieces on top of the cup. I had to buy another product (ninja) for chopping. It does way better job.
customer_reviews.author: FMD

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a replacement for my broken 7yo hand blender. What i got is probably my new favorite kitchen tool. Powerful and very well built. But over the top is the grip that speeds it up by how much you grip.
customer_reviews.author: R. Singer

customer_reviews.title: BOTH RECIPIENTS LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: One for brother, one for daughter. I thought it was nothing but a Magic Spoon for lazy people who didn't like to stir. What did I know?? They love it and play with it, making perfect dishes!
customer_reviews.author: unsworthyeti

customer_reviews.title: changed my life in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Main blender, mini chopper, and small whisk are all wonderfully functional. The immersion blender works even for fairly shallow solids/liquid mixtures without splatters if one simply lifts it up and down, being careful not to tilt it to the side and thereby expose blades. Brilliant, versatile design.
customer_reviews.author: Pc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hand kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older, 15 y/o, Braun hand blender after one of the accessories broke and pleased about the swap. Very powerful motor and the best feature is the variable speed control, with 5 different levels. It takes a few practice tries to learn about the subtle touch involved. We’ve made humus and whipped a cheesecake mixture with fantastic results. Most pleased with the purchase as would the next person to buy it! Most highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Bredfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Best hand blender on the market.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike about my hand blender is that the blade is hard to clean on the "underside" when it has dried on. A baby bottle brush works pretty good. Just clean it immediately after use and all should be well . I only make these comments because of colleagues inability to respect the equipment. I also understand that this equipment is not to be used for professional purposes. Please give me a professional option if you are able.
customer_reviews.author: Tekichik

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this thing. I mostly just use the processor and the immersion blender, but both the potato thing and whisk worked fine too. Good gizmo and perfect for someone who works with smaller quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as, or better than, our first Braun
customer_reviews.text: We gave our old Braun blender to our daughter, so needed a new one. We were so pleased with the first one that we purchased Braun again - excellent decision. Love that the speed/power increases and decreases based on how hard you squeeze the control.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley P

customer_reviews.title: Recieved bad product
customer_reviews.text: When I recied the product it had some kind of jelly substance on it. And when I went to test the product it sounded damaged and did not function properly. A part of it was also out of its place/ broken off. I'm not sure if it was just a bad shipment or what but I did not appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha willI

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for chopping herbs
customer_reviews.text: fantastic for chopping herbs... I have the Breville immersible, but it's not as effective at fine chopping as this one.... I bought it mainly for the herb chopping attachment
customer_reviews.author: Eve K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hand held blender - my first one lasted 15 years. Its quite powerful however the food processer attachment was flimsy this time and I think it broke on the first use - I am disappointed because I actually do use a lot and purchased Braun specifically for this attachment vs Cuisinart from Costco at half the price
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Good for most small jobs
customer_reviews.text: The processor bowl works well for most chopping jobs. Grating cheese like cheddar causes the lid to disengage. Making mayo using the canister works well but don't let it get too thick or you'll be wearing mayonnaise.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Only two short comings.  Power cord to short and no lid for the canister.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the cord needs to be longer. The safety takes some getting use to. Great that it fits in a wide mouth mason jar my last one would not. The shape of the head seems to make things blend faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jack (NMI) Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade. Our old Brain stock blender burned out after 23 years. Figured I’d stick with Braun. Braun made improvements but is still very useful. This is the most used small appliance in our kitchen. Buy it and don’t fret well made and if you get 20 years out of it it’s money well spent
customer_reviews.author: pgator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I had a much much older version of this Braun but needed to finally replace it. It snaps on and off more easily and I love the tasks I can do with this so that I don’t have to haul out my larger appliances for small tasks.
customer_reviews.author: marti

customer_reviews.title: Braun just does it better. This is my third hand blender
customer_reviews.text: Braun just does it better. This is my third hand blender. The first was a cheap model and did not last long. The second was a Viking and it did last a long time (the gear finally stripped). It had some of the same parts as my new Braun, but Braun has upped the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is the right way to build a submersible blender. Love the detachable dishwasher safe attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Main unit solid but pretty big
customer_reviews.text: The mixer feels and looks solid and we'll made. Compared to an older model it's much larger and lots of parts all together a storage problem. Could use it's own storage box. Otherwise, it's a solid, versitile performer.
customer_reviews.author: Apollonius

customer_reviews.title: Best hand blender ever!
customer_reviews.text: So happy that the Braun blender is available in U.S now!!! It works so much better than my old KitchenAid blender. If my old blender is iPhone 3Gs this Braun blender is definitely an iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Nico Nico

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I bought it to replace a braun my mom purchased that was probably as old as me (I'm 32) and I was reluctant because older stuff is always better but the old one stopped functioning a week ago. This blew the old one out of the water! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Braun is one of my favorite brands for the kitchen. Love the whisker - can get egg whites beaten to soft foam in seconds. Love the button/lock on the top of motor stick. The plastic lid for chopper seem flimsy, though. I owned similar set 10 years back and it was much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: antique

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my arsenal of kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool! Making soup and tomato sauce has never been so easy. Going to try to make another sauce with this. Although the safety lock is good, can be annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: Chengcheng X.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I use everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. i had old version then I decided to buy new style. this braun brand never die. anytime little thing to chop or grounded daily everyday this is for you. I can't live without this.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Culotta

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Hope it lives up to the Braun reputation of durability. Replaced a Cuisinart that I got tired of replacing every few years. The chopper attachment is very small and not very functional.
customer_reviews.author: JRam

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for making smoothies quickly in small single person volumes. The added accessories and attachments work well and are very durable, however i haven't used any hard products in the accessories yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M

customer_reviews.title: Not Smooth for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a well built product but it is not well designed for what would seem like one of its principle uses....smoothies. The blender attachment head is too large to fit into most glasses, so you are forced to use the plastic mixing cup and pour into a glass. I owned a Kitchen Aid hand blender and decided to try another make due to what I felt was poor customer service when the motor died. What the Kitchen Aid lacked in motor, it made up by fitting into a glass and keeping clean up to a minimum. If this Braun had contemplated this fact, it would be hands down better. Without it, I am left a bit frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Christie W.

customer_reviews.title: The Hammer of Thor
customer_reviews.text: Wield its power carefully, mortal, or be forced to reckon with the Second Law of Thermodynamics: What the Multiquick blends cannot be unblended. Press the button for half as long as when you used the puny blender you're replacing.
customer_reviews.author: David Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Caught fire after 2 weeks of use for baby food. Waiting for a replacement from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Braun
customer_reviews.text: After three to four uses there was smoke coming out and it stopped working
customer_reviews.author: bhumireddy

customer_reviews.title: Best hand blender ever
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and most versatile. Everyone needs to own this blender as you can do lots of things with it. Braun is the best!
customer_reviews.author: SugarMagnolia45

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! I was waiting for newer model in is for a long time. This one has a lot of improvements that I love. The chopper is easy to wash now and the water doesn't accumulate in the lead. I love the sensor button that you can adjust the speed by applying different amount of pressure. At the same time,if I need to use it for a little bit longer than 5 minutes ,my thumb starting to hurt from pushing the button constantly. I wish they was an option to set the speed without needing to hold the button also. Overall all this is the BEST hand mixer and chopper
customer_reviews.author: AnnaF

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Most right decision on baby solid food.use it every single meal for my little one with blend function .but there is wired oil coming out from chop head and unable to clean it thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product especially for baby food
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! We use this to purée baby food, it’s very powerful, easy to use and clean and purées chicken breast (with some chicken stock) beautifully - my 7 month old loves the texture. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Catchingchic

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: We have had prior immersion blenders. It's a combination of ease of use, the smoothness of the food, and ease to clean. This one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen equipment with good accessories.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT piece of kitchen equipment. I am glad I bought this. My lentil soups are so smooth now! Don't even need to add any cream.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Smooth soup in seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. No splashing. Only think to make it better would be a custom storage box!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The size for the tools including the plastic pot is too small. You may need to make it bigger. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Haitham

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The other one I bought before, the motor burned in three days! I'll start with this one after I return it. I'm sorry I bought it too late. Super super easy to use. I'm so happy to use it as supplementary food for baby every day
customer_reviews.author: xue z.

customer_reviews.title: I love the power and concept of this machine!
customer_reviews.text: It's my second one from Braun. Unfortunately I left my old one at a summer rental 😝 had to replace it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once for whipping egg whites. Apparently it is not the tool to use for whipping egg whites, however is nice for homemade dressings. It seems to be made well, however we have only used once. Will update review once we have had a chance to use it a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: erobbins225

customer_reviews.title: The Braun MQ725 is a nicely crafted tool
customer_reviews.text: The Braun MQ725 is a nicely crafted tool. I am sure that it works fine for most uses. It doesn't work for my needs. Daily I make a fruit and protein drink in a large mouth canning jar. Have done this for over 10 years. The Braun would not blend in the canning in the jar without making a mess. It would not blend the frozen berries. The berries packed tight above the blade not allowing any further blending without removing the material. I have since bought a cheap blender that is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Casey

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars....and more
customer_reviews.text: I just used this after the holidays, and I love it. Quiet, very powerful, and quick, and it easy clean up ....no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Rehertha Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ended up buying this immersion blender for my girlfriend after researching dozens of them. She loves it. It is easy to use and easy to clean and the variable speed switch is a great feature. This is a great immersion blender for the money. Don't hesitate, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: BamBam

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Deep bowl for grinding. Powerful. None of these are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Napurano

customer_reviews.title: The mini chopper is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The engine is excellent. Very powerful. The blending shaft is solid and well designed. Whisk attachment is OK but does not inspire much confidence. 1.5 cup chopper is cheaply made, the moving part broke after I use it for slicing parmesan cheese. The price increase from $79.79 to $ 100 makes this item overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Andreea

customer_reviews.title: Best quality immersion blender on the market. Great power & versitile.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, best design & powerful. Easy to clean. A bit more expensive but worth it. Great to have small food processer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have household
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender for prepare baby food,its very convenient,easy to use and easy clean! I love the chopping bowl very much,small size just I want!much better than my original one!high speed and more efficiency!
customer_reviews.author: Zhe

customer_reviews.title: Powerful immersion blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender, it's really powerful. The chopper attachment is a little too small but it works great. I chopped hard parmesan cheese and pecorino cheese, it does the job in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and quality - matched well !
customer_reviews.text: Loved it loved it loved it ! Space friendly, convenient to use and easy maintenance. Like after using hand blender I separate the motor unit and hand wash the blade area with soap water, put it to dry and done ! Must have! especially if you are always on go working professional like me :)
customer_reviews.author: Binita

customer_reviews.title: This product not fit to 220V, it's only fit for 110V
customer_reviews.text: the description above not write in any place on this product page!!
customer_reviews.author: maormen20

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly and As Described
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it makes it super easy to make soup!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and comes in a very sturdy case. Plenty of attachments, even an extender to get into the bottom of pitchers.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Terek

customer_reviews.title: overheating
customer_reviews.text: it was overheating in less than a minute of use :(
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: A very frustrating hand blender. The design of the safety lock makes using this blender not worth having. I way prefer the older design without this safety lock.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wanted in my kitchen. It does the job very well, whether it's to make idli/dosa batter, grinding soaked pulses, making Indian chutneys or purees, blending soups.
customer_reviews.author: shahr

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems very powerful, really like to vortex action. And the multiple speed based on pressure switch.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie234

customer_reviews.title: Bottom basement level hand-blender
customer_reviews.text: If all you want to do it chop scallions, this is the model for you. We’ve now had two models start smoking and melt to due to medium use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L. Scofield

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: I like this item. I searched a lot, finally I selected it. The power control is easy and safe, but the slice cutter is unuseful. I can't control them when the shape of vegitable are various. I think only basic item is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Seon H

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. I'd do it again but I don't think I'll ever have to.
customer_reviews.text: It was an excellent present for my wife. This thing works! Don't try to mash potatoes with it, it purees them!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!! So much in just one box!! I purchased it mainly for the immersion blender, but really love the little chopper for making pico. Since we are empty nesters it is just the right size for us.
customer_reviews.author: busymomof4

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. Well built and very useful. We have tried most of the attachments and they all work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walmer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the blender attachment as of now. It is very powerful and I have made a lot of soups, with large, chunky ingredients. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ffudddtoo

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: It's comvience works hard for u and has many uses I usr it for chopping veg smithing out gravies and sauces blending shakes cant think of much i dont use it for
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The food processor part broke so quickly after a month!
customer_reviews.author: M. Aghagholizadeh

customer_reviews.title: I wish the safety button didn't deactivate so quickly. ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the safety button didn't deactivate so quickly. One button pulsing would be preferred. But it does have a much stronger motor than my last brand.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Wondful Braun Blender
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old Braun hand blender that I had over 20 years. I have used it several times and really like the flexible speed on the unit. Really blends great to.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Braun hand blender
customer_reviews.text: good construction good power easy to control accessories are good quality love the mash potatoes accessory
customer_reviews.author: Melmac

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this immersion blender set !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this immersion blender for smoothies, soups, and mashed vegetables( butternut squash and potatoes). I found it easy to use even with small hands. It was quiet enough that I could still have a phone conversation while using it. Its easy to use , easy to clean, relatively quiet and one of my most useful tools.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife. She was super excited to unbox and try it, only to discover a vital part missing. The chopping blade was not included in the box..bummer! We called Amazon and didn't seem a clue what we were talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my last one lasted 20 years and it was plastic. don't buy anything but BRAUN!
customer_reviews.author: morgan g milligan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It has the power to mix about anything one would normally prepare.
customer_reviews.author: M D Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great control!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this daily to make everything from soups, to shakes, to crepes!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Guerreso

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking solution.
customer_reviews.text: As you would expect from Braun, a great product works as advertised. able to blend effectively while still on the stove. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not mine anymore
customer_reviews.text: I buy this to make smooth and onion soup. My father told it and make meat ball......
customer_reviews.author: Wei Zhang

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for, it's flexible to use with any food, and gives remarkable results
customer_reviews.author: Amr A. El Sayed

customer_reviews.title: Variable speed control is a plus
customer_reviews.text: Like the way the variable speed works. Clean-up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: caryn pierce

customer_reviews.title: Itjust stopped working. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few weeks then suddenly stopped working. Threw out the box so i dont know if it has warranty. And even if it has warranty the cost of it and hassle of getting it fixed is just too much.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

product_meta.title: Braun 3-in-1 Immersion Hand Blender, Powerful 400W Stainless Steel Stick Blender, Variable Speed + 1.5-Cup Food Processor, Whisk, Beaker, Easy to Clean, MultiQuick MQ725
product_meta.description: Size:MQ725| Color:BlackExperience true control and power with just a squeeze of your hand. The first hand blender with smart speed technology, Braun MultiQuick 7, Model MQ725, helps you prep meals easier than ever. The power bell system blends food in a flash without splashing or suction. Includes a beaker, whisk and 1. 5 cup chopper attachments that let you whip up creativity.
feature_bullets: Power Bell technology - Durable stainless steel blades and unique bell-shaped blending shaft for fast and finer results
Smart speed- The world's first smart speed technology. The more you squeeze, the more power you get. Feel how easy it is to regulate speeds with one hand
Easy Click ensures all attachments can be removed with one simple click
Soft grip handle for comfortable use
20 ounce beaker, whisk attachment and mini chopper attachment included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,124 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
